detected_errors.description: More than 50% of rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are missing or not represented: no balcony, no bath/WC core, no clear Bed 3 and Bed 4 separation (only ~2 bedrooms visible), and no stair/recess/activity-room configuration as drawn.

Overall layout topology does not match the 2D plan (room count, adjacency, and key partitions differ substantially), indicating it is not a faithful geometric transformation of the provided floor plan.

summary: Although the render is genuinely 3D, it does not correspond to the given 2D plan and omits most of the plan’s rooms/spaces, triggering automatic rejection.
